vendor_name: Hôtel Domaine Ribiera, Spa & Golf Resort
title: Charming Boutique Escape in the Heart of Provence with Daily Breakfast & Unlimited Spa Acces
description: Surrounded by rambling olive trees, lavender fields and cypress groves, this charming countryside retreat offers a grand chateau escape in the heart of Provence, and nearby to Forcalquier. Ideally located between the Luberon and Verdon national parks, this tranquil retreat offers the perfect base to explore the region's renowned vineyards, historic castles and world-class bistros and brasseries. Indulge in sumptuous modern French cuisine al fresco at Le Ribiera, unwind at the Ribiera Spa with complimentary access to the facilities including the jacuzzi and hammam, or take to the nine-hole pitch-and-putt golf course.
